tool_description: Calculates comprehensive risk metrics including VaR, expected shortfall, drawdowns, and beta measures for portfolio risk assessment.

returns.description: Array of return values for risk calculation

benchmark_returns.description: Benchmark return series for beta calculation

var_method.description: VaR calculation method: historical, parametric, monte_carlo

portfolio_value.description: Current portfolio value for absolute risk measures

include_stress_tests.description: Whether to include stress test scenarios

error_messages: Insufficient return data: Need at least 30 return observations for reliable risk calculation.
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.90 and 0.99.
Invalid VaR method: Use one of [historical, parametric, monte_carlo].
Portfolio value must be positive: Provide a value greater than 0.
Holding period out of range: Must be between 1 and 30 days.
Mismatched benchmark data: If provided, benchmark_returns must have same length as returns.
usage: Provide returns array and optionally benchmark_returns, confidence_level, var_method, portfolio_value, holding_period, and include_stress_tests flag.
